title: Why is BTS called gay? - Quora

response.answer_text: They wear more makeup Korean/Asian male celebrities use more makeup than most Western male celebrities. In Korea, men wearing makeup is common, and like BTS, they are K-pop idols, which means most of the time, flashy outfits and stage, bright smooth pale skin, red or pink lips are concepts of how an idol would look like. The typical korean/asian beauty standard usually includes ‘pretty boys’ or guys with boyish, young and innocent looks. The members of BTS have such image, even though the concepts of their album or songs do change, but regardlessthey wear eyeliner, foundation, eyeshadow, liptints in interviews, shows, music videos and especially concerts or performance etc. My American friend mentioned to me that Western male celebrities don’t wear eyeliner as much like K-pop idols, and I myself noticed it then. The makeup the BTS members wore at BBMA 2017 awards was quite light compared to their usual makeup. Just because they are wearing makeup, some call them ‘gay’ as though it’s a negative term because people still think most boys aren’t supposed to wear them.
